articles.author: Tsveta Ermenkova
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 series price leaked: More affordable or pricey - PhoneArena
articles.description: Find out how much the Galaxy S24, S24 Plus, and S24 Ultra will cost in Europe and what it means for the US market.
articles.content: Here's the scoop from the source: The Galaxy S24 is rumored to hit the shelves at 899 ($999) for 128GB storage and 959 ($1066) for 256GB, a tad more pocket-friendly compared to last year's European S… [+1412 chars]
